<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// then decreasing size, and then the original order as recorded</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in Scratch.  The decreasing-size aspect of this is only really</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// important if we get into the gap-filling stage below, but it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// doesn&#39;t hurt here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#add1eb5637dd671428b6f138ed3db6428">array&#95;pod&#95;sort</a>(FirstFlexible, E,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">                 &#91;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;lhs, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;rhs) -&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Decreasing alignment.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#a31b084098ebbf47988d1817a597b52d2">Alignment</a> != rhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#a31b084098ebbf47988d1817a597b52d2">Alignment</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#a31b084098ebbf47988d1817a597b52d2">Alignment</a> &lt; rhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#a31b084098ebbf47988d1817a597b52d2">Alignment</a> ? 1 : -1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Decreasing size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#ae472b245af5bd4a76bea7581ea772185">Size</a> != rhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#ae472b245af5bd4a76bea7581ea772185">Size</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#ae472b245af5bd4a76bea7581ea772185">Size</a> &lt; rhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#ae472b245af5bd4a76bea7581ea772185">Size</a> ? 1 : -1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Original order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> lhsNumber = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uintptr&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(lhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#a432caecc9417394c69f599b6476febdb">Scratch</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> rhsNumber = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uintptr&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(rhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#a432caecc9417394c69f599b6476febdb">Scratch</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhsNumber != rhsNumber)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lhsNumber &lt; rhsNumber ? -1 : 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do a quick check for whether that sort alone has given us a perfect</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// layout with no interior padding.  This is very common: if the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fixed-layout fields have no interior padding, and they end at a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sufficiently-aligned offset for all the flexible-layout fields,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and the flexible-layout fields all have sizes that are multiples</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of their alignment, then this will reliably trigger.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasPadding = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t LastEnd = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Walk the fixed-offset fields.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Fields.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref/#aae2bf8b46988a2fc0589e95903930c19">begin</a>(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != FirstFlexible; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;hasFixedOffset());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LastEnd != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Offset) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">        HasPadding = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">      LastEnd = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getEndOffset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Walk the flexible-offset fields, optimistically assigning fixed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// offsets.  Note that we maintain a strict division between the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fixed-offset and flexible-offset fields, so if we end up</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// discovering padding later in this loop, we can just abandon this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// work and we&#39;ll ignore the offsets we already assigned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!HasPadding) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = FirstFlexible; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(LastEnd, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Alignment);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LastEnd != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">          HasPadding = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Offset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">        LastEnd = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getEndOffset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we already have a perfect layout, we&#39;re done.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!HasPadding) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="#a75125d8eb26768d94eb9d913015246aa">checkValidLayout</a>(Fields, LastEnd, MaxAlign);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(LastEnd, MaxAlign);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The algorithm sketch at this point is as follows.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Consider the padding gaps between fixed-offset fields in ascending</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order.  Let LastEnd be the offset of the first byte following the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// field before the gap, or 0 if the gap is at the beginning of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// structure.  Find the &quot;best&quot; flexible-offset field according to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// criteria below.  If no such field exists, proceed to the next gap.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, add the field at the first properly-aligned offset for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that field that is &gt;= LastEnd, then update LastEnd and repeat in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order to fill any remaining gap following that field.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Next, let LastEnd to be the offset of the first byte following the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// last fixed-offset field, or 0 if there are no fixed-offset fields.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// While there are flexible-offset fields remaining, find the &quot;best&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// flexible-offset field according to the criteria below, add it at</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the first properly-aligned offset for that field that is &gt;= LastEnd,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and update LastEnd to the first byte following the field.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The &quot;best&quot; field is chosen by the following criteria, considered</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// strictly in order:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - When filling a gap betweeen fields, the field must fit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - A field is preferred if it requires less padding following LastEnd.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - A field is preferred if it is more aligned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - A field is preferred if it is larger.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - A field is preferred if it appeared earlier in the initial order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Minimizing leading padding is a greedy attempt to avoid padding</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// entirely.  Preferring more-aligned fields is an attempt to eliminate</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// stricter constraints earlier, with the idea that weaker alignment</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// constraints may be resolvable with less padding elsewhere.  These</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// These two rules are sufficient to ensure that we get the optimal</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// layout in the &quot;C-style&quot; case.  Preferring larger fields tends to take</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// better advantage of large gaps and may be more likely to have a size</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that&#39;s a multiple of a useful alignment.  Preferring the initial</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order may help somewhat with locality but is mostly just a way of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ensuring deterministic output.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that this algorithm does not guarantee a minimal layout.  Picking</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a larger object greedily may leave a gap that cannot be filled as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// efficiently.  Unfortunately, solving this perfectly is an NP-complete</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// problem (by reduction from bin-packing: let B&#95;i be the bin sizes and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// O&#95;j be the object sizes; add fixed-offset fields such that the gaps</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// between them have size B&#95;i, and add flexible-offset fields with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// alignment 1 and size O&#95;j; if the layout size is equal to the end of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the last fixed-layout field, the objects fit in the bins; note that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this doesn&#39;t even require the complexity of alignment).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The implementation below is essentially just an optimized version of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scanning the list of remaining fields looking for the best, which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// would be O(n^2).  In the worst case, it doesn&#39;t improve on that.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// However, in practice it&#39;ll just scan the array of alignment bins</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and consider the first few elements from one or two bins.  The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// number of bins is bounded by a small constant: alignments are powers</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of two that are vanishingly unlikely to be over 64 and fairly unlikely</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to be over 8  And multiple elements only need to be considered when</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// filling a gap between fixed-offset fields, which doesn&#39;t happen very</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// often.  We could use a data structure within bins that optimizes for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// finding the best-sized match, but it would require allocating memory</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and copying data, so it&#39;s unlikely to be worthwhile.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Start by organizing the flexible-offset fields into bins according to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// their alignment.  We expect a small enough number of bins that we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// don&#39;t care about the asymptotic costs of walking this.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">AlignmentQueue &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The minimum size of anything currently in this queue.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t MinSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The head of the queue.  A singly-linked list.  The order here should</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// be consistent with the earlier sort, i.e. the elements should be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// monotonically descending in size and otherwise in the original order.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// We remove the queue from the array as soon as this is empty.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield">OptimizedStructLayoutField</a> &#42;Head;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The alignment requirement of the queue.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;getNext(<a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;Cur) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Cur-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#a432caecc9417394c69f599b6476febdb">Scratch</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;AlignmentQueue, 8&gt;</a> FlexibleFieldsByAlignment;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = FirstFlexible; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Head = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Alignment = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Alignment;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t MinSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Size;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LastInQueue = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Alignment == Alignment; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">      LastInQueue-&gt;Scratch = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">      LastInQueue = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">      MinSize = std::min(MinSize, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Size);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">    LastInQueue-&gt;Scratch = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> checkQueues = &#91;&amp;&#93;&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> LastQueueAlignment;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Queue : FlexibleFieldsByAlignment) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((FirstQueue || Queue.Alignment &lt; LastQueueAlignment) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;bins not in order of descending alignment&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal">      LastQueueAlignment = Queue.Alignment;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">      FirstQueue = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Queue.Head &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;queue was empty&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t LastSize = ~(uint64&#95;t)0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Queue.Head; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Queue.getNext(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Alignment == Queue.Alignment &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;bad field in queue&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Size &lt;= LastSize &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;queue not in descending size order&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">        LastSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Size;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Helper function to remove a field from a queue.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> spliceFromQueue = &#91;&amp;&#93;(AlignmentQueue &#42;Queue, <a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>, <a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;Cur) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a> ? <Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we&#39;re removing Cur from a non-initial position, splice it out</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the linked list.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>-&gt;Scratch = Cur-&gt;Scratch;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If Cur was the last field in the list, we need to update MinSize.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We can just use the last field&#39;s size because the list is in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// descending order of size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Cur-&gt;Scratch)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">        Queue-&gt;MinSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>-&gt;Size;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, replace the head.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewHead = Queue-&gt;getNext(Cur))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal">        Queue-&gt;Head = NewHead;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we just emptied the queue, destroy its bin.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">        FlexibleFieldsByAlignment.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a563ffc2ff61c499b3be2e00100cb72fa">erase</a>(Queue);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do layout into a local array.  Doing this in-place on Fields is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// not really feasible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Field, 16&gt;</a> Layout;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">  Layout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a499ea32ca1b8d16cedfe01d1e5b08f29">reserve</a>(Fields.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The offset that we&#39;re currently looking to insert at (or after).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t LastEnd = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Helper function to splice Cur out of the given queue and add it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to the layout at the given offset.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> addToLayout = &#91;&amp;&#93;(AlignmentQueue &#42;Queue, <a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>, <a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;Cur,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">                         uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) -&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(LastEnd, Cur-&gt;Alignment));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Splice out.  This potentially invalidates Queue.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">    spliceFromQueue(Queue, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>, Cur);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add Cur to the layout.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">    Layout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&#42;Cur);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">    Layout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#acd9e771a3296c6b24146955754620557">back</a>().Offset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">    LastEnd = Layout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#acd9e771a3296c6b24146955754620557">back</a>().getEndOffset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Always return true so that we can be tail-called.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Helper function to try to find a field in the given queue that&#39;ll</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fit starting at StartOffset but before EndOffset (if present).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that this never fails if EndOffset is not provided.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> tryAddFillerFromQueue = &#91;&amp;&#93;(AlignmentQueue &#42;Queue, uint64&#95;t StartOffset,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   std::optional&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; EndOffset) -&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Queue-&gt;Head);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(StartOffset == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(LastEnd, Queue-&gt;Alignment));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!EndOffset || StartOffset &lt; &#42;EndOffset);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Figure out the maximum size that a field can be, and ignore this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// queue if there&#39;s nothing in it that small.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxViableSize =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">      (EndOffset ? &#42;EndOffset - StartOffset : ~(uint64&#95;t)0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Queue-&gt;MinSize &gt; MaxViableSize)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find the matching field.  Note that this should always find</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// something because of the MinSize check above.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;Cur = Queue-&gt;Head, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">           <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a> = Cur, Cur = Queue-&gt;getNext(Cur)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Cur &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;didn&#39;t find a match in queue despite its MinSize&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Cur-&gt;Size &lt;= MaxViableSize)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> addToLayout(Queue, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>, Cur, StartOffset);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;didn&#39;t find a match in queue despite its MinSize&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Helper function to find the &quot;best&quot; flexible-offset field according</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to the criteria described above.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> tryAddBestField = &#91;&amp;&#93;(std::optional&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; BeforeOffset) -&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!BeforeOffset || LastEnd &lt; &#42;BeforeOffset);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> QueueB = FlexibleFieldsByAlignment.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> QueueE = FlexibleFieldsByAlignment.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a075e34e98605d0e7c289763a104869ac">end</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Start by looking for the most-aligned queue that doesn&#39;t need any</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// leading padding after LastEnd.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FirstQueueToSearch = QueueB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; FirstQueueToSearch != QueueE; ++FirstQueueToSearch) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a25f1d7ccf87af8d87fcb950f7ed758b5">isAligned</a>(FirstQueueToSearch-&gt;Alignment, LastEnd))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = LastEnd;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invariant: all of the queues in &#91;FirstQueueToSearch, QueueE)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// require the same initial padding offset.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Search those queues in descending order of alignment for a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// satisfactory field.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Queue = FirstQueueToSearch; Queue != QueueE; ++Queue) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (tryAddFillerFromQueue(Queue, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, BeforeOffset))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Okay, we don&#39;t need to scan those again.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="normal">      QueueE = FirstQueueToSearch;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we started from the first queue, we&#39;re done.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FirstQueueToSearch == QueueB)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, scan backwards to find the most-aligned queue that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// still has minimal leading padding after LastEnd.  If that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// minimal padding is already at or past the end point, we&#39;re done.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal">      --FirstQueueToSearch;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(LastEnd, FirstQueueToSearch-&gt;Alignment);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BeforeOffset &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &gt;= &#42;BeforeOffset)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FirstQueueToSearch != QueueB &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal">             <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(LastEnd, FirstQueueToSearch&#91;-1&#93;.Alignment))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="normal">        --FirstQueueToSearch;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Phase 1: fill the gaps between fixed-offset fields with the best</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// flexible-offset field that fits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Fields.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref/#aae2bf8b46988a2fc0589e95903930c19">begin</a>(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != FirstFlexible; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LastEnd &lt;= I-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LastEnd != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Offset) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!tryAddBestField(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Offset))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">    Layout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">    LastEnd = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getEndOffset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Phase 2: repeatedly add the best flexible-offset field until</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// they&#39;re all gone.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!FlexibleFieldsByAlignment.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/disassembler/aarch64disassembler-cpp/#abdb086b34295fb7aa09493c62d798465">Success</a> = tryAddBestField(std::nullopt);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/disassembler/aarch64disassembler-cpp/#abdb086b34295fb7aa09493c62d798465">Success</a> &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;didn&#39;t find a field with no fixed limit?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">    (void) <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/disassembler/aarch64disassembler-cpp/#abdb086b34295fb7aa09493c62d798465">Success</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Copy the layout back into place.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Layout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() == Fields.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
